text_logic_form: The lengths of the sides are $a = 8$, $b = 15$, and $c = 17$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The lengths of the sides are $a = 8$, $b = 15$, and $c = 17$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is equal to the length of side $c$ which is $17$.
The length of the line $CB$ is equal to the length of side $a$ which is $8$.
The length of the line $CA$ is equal to the length of side $b$ which is $15$.
The line $CB$ is perpendicular to the line $CA$.
line_instances: There are lines $CA$, $CB$, $AB$, forming a triangle $CAB$.
